TopicTitle: Bug reports should be posted in the KSP2 Bug Reports subforum (linked above)

Articles.Content:
See topic. Also, here's the link to the bug report forum: https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/forum/144-ksp2-bug-reports/

And here's a link to the bug report guide: https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/212955-stock-support-bug-reporting-guide-please-read-before-posting/
